title: Bake ‘n Switch – v1.0.1 + Multiplayer
body:
Bake ‘n Switch – v1.0.1 + Multiplayer


Genres/Tags: Arcade, Party game, Isometric, 3D
Company: Streamline Studios
Languages: ENG/MULTI8
Original Size: 3.5 GB
Repack Size: 1.9 GB
Windows 10 is required to run this game

 
 

Download Mirrors

  • 1337x | KAT – [magnet] [.torrent file only]
  • Tapochek.net
  • Filehoster: MultiUpload (10+ hosters, interchangeable) [Use JDownloader2]
  • Filehoster: Google Drive (Uploaded by hermietkreeft)
  • Filehoster: Google Drive (Uploaded by Parnex)
  • Filehosters: DropArk + NitroFlare + MegaUp (Uploaded by Vikky793, not compatible with torrent)

Discussion and (possible) future updates on CS.RIN.RU thread

Screenshots (Click to enlarge)


Repack Features

  • This is a co-op ONLY game, you can’t play it alone – only network or local (on the same PC) coop are supported
  • Based on Bake_n_Switch-HOODLUM ISO release: hlm-bake_n_switch.iso (3,738,775,552 bytes)
  • Steamworks Fix is available in NoDVD folder after installation, allowing multiplayer via Steam with the same crack users; thanks to deadmau5 and kimble!
  • 100% Lossless & MD5 Perfect: all files are identical to originals after installation
  • NOTHING ripped, NOTHING re-encoded
  • Significantly smaller archive size (compressed from 3.5 to 1.9 GB)
  • Installation takes 4-10 minutes (depending on your system)
  • After-install integrity check so you could make sure that everything installed properly
  • HDD space after installation: 4 GB (~7 GB during installation)
  • Repack uses XTool library by Razor12911
  • At least 2 GB of free RAM (inc. virtual) required for installing this repack

Game Description

Lil’Bun and his bready friends are cute living dough creatures that must be sacrificed!

The Bakers must work together to catch, merge, and bake the biggest Buns. Then take aim, shoot, and score!

BUT WHY? THEY’RE SO CUTE!

Long a-dough in the World of Fla, the Master Bakers came together to defeat the Mouldies. An infection that threatened those unreasonably cute blobular Dough creatures, and thus the food source of their World. Centuries have passed, but now something is rising again. The Mould is back! As the World crumbles above, the ancient Guardians rumble below. Awoken from their hibernation to fulfill their sworn duties to protect the doughy creatures of Fla.

Game Features

  • 100 co-op levels including PVP and Team v Team levels
  • 7 Bun species with unique behaviors. Some useful, some troublesome.
  • 6 Bakers with gameplay abilities. Fancy yielding a rolling pin or flash-fire baking on the spot?!
  • 2 Worlds; the lush palms and sandy beaches of Tropic Toaster to the harsh and unforgiving terrain of Serradurra.
  • 2 Multi-stage Boss fights, and 12 enemies to battle off.
  • Unlockable costumes – get those max scores to collect enough stars to reveal new character costumes.
  • Unlockable levels – master advanced maps and take on Stormy variants of your favorite levels.
